Naima Lamcharki (a mụrụ na 1943 na Casablanca) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri.
Lamcharki ritere ihe nrite maka Best Female Lead maka arụmọrụ ya na A la recherche du mari de ma femme na 6th National Film Festival n'afọ 2001.
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite Best Actress na Sweden's 11th annual Malmo Arab Film Festival (MAFF) maka ọrụ ya na Mohamed Moftakir's Liao automne des pommiers
